p.k: Kickboxing champion Matt Reeves witnesses the murder of his friend Johnny. When he investigates the circumstances of Johnny’s death it appears that a Mr. Neegal in South Africa has founded a new kickboxing association and is forcing fighters to participate. Mr. Neegal has a reputation of killing anyone who gets in his way. Matt faces danger in investigating his friend’s death but he finds an unexpected ally in the man Neegal sends to kill him.
